content: {"message": "Hello, Felipe! This is Donna from Arionkoder. I'm reaching out to you to gather some missing information. Could you please provide me with your last name?", "continue_chat": true}
Meu nome final é Gouveia, com você.
{"message": "Thank you, Felipe Gouveia. I appreciate your help in providing the information. Have a great day!", "continue_chat": false}
